price: Twanabagize abayobozi bahamagarira (abantu) kugana umuriro, kandi ku munsi w’imperuka ntibazatabarwa.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yadʿūna ilā al-nāri wayawma al-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūna
